storyInfo: Mr. Nothing helps a little girl escape and manages to meet up with Kroos. Saga, Dawn, and Lava take a moment of respite in the pawn shop. Dawn seems to know something.

attributes.content: Uwhhh, *whimper*...
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Young lady, look at how the sky is bright now. We've gone quite a far way, and we'll be there soon. Don't you cry.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: *whimper*...
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Now, now, I'm here with you. You're perfectly safe.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: *Sigh*... don't cry, now, don't cry. Look, you can see the garden. We'll be right there.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkhaa!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Yaaahhh—!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Wh—Why are they here?! Weren't they meant to fear the sun?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Come, ride on my back, hold on!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkhaa!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Mister! Mister, run faster!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Don't—Don't pull on my hair! My glasses are falling off!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkhaa! Gkhaa!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: He runs pretty darn quick, that Mr. Nothing.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hero, what are you talking about?
attributes.name: Villager

attributes.content: Hm? Ah, nothing. You get to the garden and hide quick. Leave the outside watch to me.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: That miniature Ink Spirit seems a little faster than your garden variety Originium slug... but it also looks like it's gone a little dizzy?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Maybe it really can't catch up to Mr. Nothing...? Who'd have thought?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Gkh... gkhaa... gkhaa...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Watch this! Hey! Heh! Yah!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hahah! Can't get us now, can you!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkh!?
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Mister! Run a little faster, come on!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I've wanted to do that forever! Pull off a little something when you're chased through the streets, just like all those martial arts stars on the silver screen!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: F—Faster! Faster!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Don't smack me! I'm not a burdenbeast!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkhaakh—!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: It went around!? With the sun shining on its ass! Didn't they say these things feared sunlight?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: S—Save us!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Tck! Here, young lady, you go on ahead, I'll—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkh!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Gkh!?
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Gkh... gkh...
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: It's Kroos, my benefactor! Dear me, here, good benefactor, come, if you had a free hand, you could've helped me a little sooner! Er, where, where are you?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Right here.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yah...! M—Miss, where did you come from?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Wow! I'd be remiss not to laud your sniping skills as beyond the blue! You slip about like a ghost, land without a whisper! You really are—
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Miss! Thank you for saving mister!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Err.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Run on back, quick. Your mum's been looking for you for ages now.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Mm-hm!
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Benefactor, why don't you hurry to Lava and Saga's aid? Let me keep watch here, safeguard the perimeter.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Didn't you just cross your heart you'd return to Lava to help her?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: B—Benefactor, might you have the gift of clairaudience...?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Why've you been holding onto that folding fan the whole time?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ah, I simply must! This fan is the most precious thing I have, a present to me from my most respected teacher! I'd hate to let it out of my grasp!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Moreover, here, clasping this fan in my hand, I look quite refined, don't I?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmmmgh...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Why'd that Ink Spirit get over here just now without any trouble? It counts as daytime, right?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I was wondering too! That cretin chased the wind out of me!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmm... anyhow, better head for Lava.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It's quiet.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: We're clearly on the fringe of night here. I can only see a crack of dawnlight. Why aren't any monsters charging through?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I also thought it strange. It has never been so peaceful, has it?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Isn't it good that it's peaceful?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Ha! That is so. I may at last catch my breath!
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Huff!
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Careful you don't crush any goods.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Saga, the Dusk Beauty you mentioned just now... who does that refer to?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Naturally, the Dusk Beauty of the well-told 'Dusk Beauty Flying to the Moon' tale. My word, to this day I cannot forget the sight of the eyes of Dusk Beauty—
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Saga, tell it a little slower. Miss Lava's giving you a funnier and funnier look.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Oh, beg pardon, 'twas my impatience. Lava, thou art also tired from withstanding Ink Spirits, art thou not? Ought we perhaps sit down with some tea, and there make proper talk?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Sure. I'll go brew you some tea, then.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Right, I would like to ask thee first. Young Dawn, dost thou know any way of leaving this place?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Thou dost not?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: (Lightly shakes head)
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.text: Dawn lifts her head, looks to the open door, and along the road to far away.
—for fear of disturbing those above of heaven.
